input.sentences: there were many crowds along side of the road on the day of the annual bike race .
the cyclists had a very tough course which included some very steep inclines .
fans snap pictures as the racers work their way up the hilly street .
you can see how much brute strength it takes to tackle this tough course .
the contestants are very close together as they reached to top of the hill .
output.sentences: The road was closed for the bike race on that day.
Starting out was tough due to a steep incline included as part of an endurance check.
I thought the street might snap with this amount of racers!
Being tough is what it takes to tackle that incline.
Once at the top, they reached a hill that went down and back up to the finish line.
